summary: Frontend-only testing completed for Nego's 7 new features: Mobile Bottom Navigation, Onboarding Modal, Admin Payouts, Dashboard pages responsiveness, Login/Register with Google OAuth, Landing page, and NotificationBell component. All features are working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: MobileBottomNav.tsx: Correctly implements role-based navigation with data-testid attributes for all nav items
OnboardingModal.tsx: Properly uses localStorage with key format 'nego_onboarding_{role}_{userId}' to track completion
OnboardingModal.tsx: All 3 role variants (client, talent, admin) have appropriate step content
PayoutsClient.tsx: Admin can view withdrawal requests, approve/reject with reason, view talent balances and history tabs
DashboardClient.tsx: Correctly integrates OnboardingModal and MobileBottomNav components
NotificationBell.tsx: Has data-testid='notification-bell' and implements realtime Supabase subscription
Login/Register pages: Google OAuth button visible and functional
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 7 features tested and working. Mobile bottom nav shows on mobile viewport with 5 nav items (Home, Browse, Bookings, Messages, Profile). Onboarding modal appears on first login and can be skipped or completed. Admin payouts page has 3 tabs (Withdrawal Requests, Talent Balances, History) with approve/reject functionality. All dashboard pages render correctly.

verified_working.landing_page: ✓ NEGO branding, hero section with 'Negotiate' button, responsive design
verified_working.login_page: ✓ Welcome Back title, email/password inputs, Sign In button, Google OAuth button
verified_working.register_page: ✓ 2-step flow: Step 1 (role selection Client/Talent), Step 2 (form with Google OAuth)
verified_working.mobile_bottom_nav: ✓ Shows on mobile viewport (390x844), 5 nav items with data-testid attributes, navigation works
verified_working.onboarding_modal_client: ✓ 4 steps: Browse Talent, Book & Pay, Verify Identity, Connect - Skip and Next buttons work
verified_working.dashboard_home: ✓ Welcome message, stats cards, Featured Talent section, sidebar navigation
verified_working.dashboard_profile: ✓ User info, stats (coins, bookings, member since), profile information
verified_working.dashboard_settings: ✓ Account section, Notifications toggles, Privacy settings, Legal links
verified_working.dashboard_favorites: ✓ 'No favorites yet' message with Browse Talent CTA
verified_working.dashboard_bookings: ✓ My Bookings title, filter tabs, booking entries
verified_working.notification_bell: ✓ data-testid='notification-bell' present, dropdown opens with notifications list
verified_working.admin_dashboard: ✓ Stats (Pending Verifications, Pending Payouts, Total Users, Total Bookings)
verified_working.admin_payouts_requests: ✓ Shows pending withdrawal requests with Approve/Reject buttons
verified_working.admin_payouts_balances: ✓ Lists all talents with their coin balances
